item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 12/10/2025 # New Features & Improvements # Added an idle-wait setting to define how many seconds of inactivity to wait before automatically hanging up on Twilio calls. Added voicemail detection examples; when the voice agent hears sentences similar to these examples, it treats the call as reaching the userâ€™s voicemail and proceeds accordingly. 12/04/2025 # New Features & Improvements # Fixed a bug where changing the Speech-to-Text language within the same language category incorrectly changed the TTS language.
